definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: booty, plunder;—abs. ´[[מ]]: 2Ki 21:14 +, so Is 42:24 Qr ([[מְשִׁסָּה]] Gi, [[מְשִׁיסָּה]] Baer; Kt [[משוסה]], usu. read [[מְשׁוּסָּה]], < read [[מְשׁוֹסֶה]], v. [[שׁסה]]

definitions.title: Pō‘.
definitions.body: ); pl. abs. [[מְשִׁסּוֹה]] Hb Hab 2:7;—plunder, spoil, prey, usu. ´[[הָיׇה לִמ]]: (and ‖[[בַּז ]]) 2Ki 21:14, Je 30:16, Hb Hab 2:7, Zep 1:13 (‖[[שְׁמָמָה ]]), cf. Is 42:22 (v:Is 42:24 see above).
